mapper.select: SELECT C.CLB_ETPR_CODE, C.CLB_NM, C.CLB_DC, C.CLB_KIND FROM CLB C, EMPL E WHERE C.CLB_CONFM_AT = #{clbConfmAt} AND CLB_CHIRMN_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO CLB ( CLB_ETPR_CODE, CLB_NM, CLB_DC, CLB_DATE, CLB_PSNCPA, CLB_CHIRMN_EMPL_ID, CLB_KIND, CLB_CONFM_AT ) VALUES ( #{clbEtprCode}, #{clbNm}, #{clbDc}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{clbPsncpa}, #{clbChirmnEmplId}, #{clbKind}, '0' )INTO CLB_MBR ( CLB_ETPR_CODE, CLB_MBR_EMPL_ID ) VALUES ( #{clbEtprCode}, #{clbMbrEmplId} ) SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT C.CLB_ETPR_CODE, C.CLB_NM, C.CLB_DC, C.CLB_DATE, C.CLB_PSNCPA, C.CLB_CHIRMN_EMPL_ID, C.CLB_KIND, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLB_MBR WHERE CLB_MBR_EMPL_ID = #{clbMbrEmplId} AND CLB_ETPR_CODE = #{clbEtprCode}) AS JOINCHK FROM CLB C, EMPL E WHERE C.CLB_CONFM_AT = '1' AND C.CLB_CHIRMN_EMPL_ID = E.EMPL_ID AND C.CLB_ETPR_CODE = #{clbEtprCode}
